update t_train_plan
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_dttm = #{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where train_id = #{trainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_train_plan set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_dttm = #{createDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_dttm = #{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where train_id = #{trainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
